snippet: The Russian security agency said 20 nongovernmental organizations in Ingushetia were shut for having links to foreign spy agencies, but local groups say none appear to have been closed.
lead_paragraph: The Russian security agency said 20 nongovernmental organizations in Ingushetia were shut for having links to foreign spy agencies, but local groups say none appear to have been closed.

headline.seo: Russia Says 20 Groups Shut Down in Caucasus
headline.main: Russia Says 20 Caucasus Groups Shut Down
headline.print_headline: Russia Says 20 Caucasus Groups Shut Down
